attributes.action: introduce legislation that will prevent bureaucrats from imposing patronizing and over-protective politically correct regulations upon the nation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Political correctness is, unwittingly, being upheld and propagated by every company, organisation and institution justifiably fearful of being pounced upon and heavily fined by the politically correct and their compensation-seeking lawyers. That’s in addition to the unwilling support given by millions of decent hardworking folk reluctant to ignore PC directives, no matter how absurd, for fear of having their jobs/careers put on hold or ruined by the politically correct. Political correctness and compensation have become instruments of fear in the hands of too many people with vested interests all too eager to play the discrimination card. As a consequence, layers of our most cherished rights, freedoms and liberties are being surreptitiously eroded. This must be stopped.
